trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFBEASTCURRENCYGUIDE_00444_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Promissory notes can be exchanged for currency by speaking with their respective vendors or a Calamity salvager.
TEXT_CMNDEFBEASTCURRENCYGUIDE_00444_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The amount of societal currency you possess is shown in the Currency window.
